description.gold-silver:
An attack that may
lower SPEED.
description.crystal:
An attack that may
lower SPEED.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Forcefully sprays bubbles
that may lower SPEED.
description.emerald:
Forcefully sprays bubbles
that may lower SPEED.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A spray of bubbles
strikes the foe.
It may lower the
foe’s SPEED stat.
description.diamond-pearl:
A spray of bubbles is
forcefully ejected
at the foe.
It may also lower the
target’s Speed stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
